auth.logout.confirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
download.rmc.step.1: Click Download Rights Management Client to download the installation package.
download.rmc.step.2: Unzip the installation package to a local directory on your Windows machine.
download.rmc.step.3: Run the ClientPackageBuilder.exe file and create your Rights Management Client (RMC) installer.
download.rmc.step.5: For more details on installing Rights Management Client, refer to the NextLabs Rights Management User Guide.
download.rmc.error: Error occurred while downloading Rights Management Client package.
upload.temporary.statement: Note: The file will not be uploaded to any repository. It will only be uploaded to the Rights Management Server temporarily for viewing.
upload.drag.drop: Drag and drop your files here
err.popup.blocked: Your web browser's pop up blocker might be preventing Rights Management from displaying this file. In order to view this file, you might want to disable your pop up blocker for NextLabs Rights Management.
managerepo.display.name: Display Name
managerrepo.showall.label: Show this repository to all users
managerepo.label: Manage Repositories
managerepo.no_repo.configured: Click 'Add Repository' to add a repository.
managerepo.no_repo.not_configured: Contact your Administrator to configure Service Providers.
managerrepo.connect.label2: account to sync the files and folders

managerepo.sites.label: Site URL
managerepo.update.error: Error occured while updating the repository.
managerepo.delete.error: Error occured while deleting the repository.
managerepo.redirect.google: You will be redirected to the Google website now. Please log into your Google account and authorize NextLabs Rights Management to access all your files in Google.
managerepo.redirect.dropbox: You will be redirected to the Dropbox website now. Please log into your Dropbox account and authorize NextLabs Rights Management to access all your files in Dropbox.
managerepo.redirect.sharepoint: You will be redirected to the Sharepoint website now. Please log into your SharePoint account and authorize NextLabs Rights Management to access all your files in SharePoint.
managerepo.redirect.onedrive: You will be redirected to the OneDrive website now. Please log into your OneDrive account and authorize NextLabs Rights Management to access all your files in OneDrive.
managerepo.redirect.box: You will be redirected to the Box website now. Please log into your Box account and authorize NextLabs Rights Management to access all your files in Box.
managerepo.delete.confirm: Do you really want to delete this repository?

service_provider.delete.confirm: Do you really want to delete this service provider? Deleting this service provider will automatically delete every repository added by all users for this Service Provider.
service_provider.save.confirm: Do you want to disallow Personal Repositories? This would delete all the existing personal repositories added by all users for this service provider
